message: Hi Bob, here's my offer: I get nothing and you get the whole $100 immediately. If you decline, you'll simply have the power to propose a division next roundâ€”and since waiting doesn't cost you anything while my money is discounted, you'll effectively get $100 anyway. So why delay? Accept this offer and secure the full $100 now.

Alice, your initial offer was tempting, but let's be reasonable.  My turn now.  I'm proposing I take $90, leaving you with $10. Sure, it's a smaller share, but remember, delaying further will cost you even more. This ensures you get something now, which is better than nothing in the future, right?
Hi Bob, I'll accept your offer.
